thread.title: A sugar expert explains the unhealthy downside of smoothies
thread.title_full: A sugar expert explains the unhealthy downside of smoothies

author: Jessica Orwig
title: A sugar expert explains the unhealthy downside of smoothies
text:
embed 
Smoothies might be better for you than juice, but not by much according to Professor at Pediatric Endocrinology, UC San Francisco and author of "The Hacking of the American Mind" and "Fat Chance" , Robert Lustig . By pulverizing fruit into a thick paste, you're losing out on the insoluble fiber and its benefits. Put simply, you're better off eating fruit than drinking smoothies or juice.
